video.title: Kolchak: The Night Stalker
video.synopsis: An Independent News Service reporter tracks down Jack the Ripper, aliens, zombies, werewolves, spooks, Satanic dogs and a boogeyman from Louisiana.

episodes.synopsis: The murders of several women throughout Chicago lead Kolchak to believe that the culprit is none other than an immortal Jack the Ripper.
episodes.title: The Ripper

episodes.synopsis: Kolchak has his hands full when he tries to stop a murdered young man whose voodoo priestess mother raised him from the dead to seek revenge.
episodes.title: The Zombie

episodes.synopsis: A mysterious dark force consumes Chicago, wiping out power, absorbing lead and electronics and extracting the bone marrow from every living thing.
episodes.title: They Have Been, They Are, They Will Be..

episodes.synopsis: Kolchak travels to Los Angeles to find call girl Catherine Rawlins, the resurrected victim of notorious vampire Janos Skorzeny.
episodes.title: The Vampire

episodes.synopsis: A pleasure cruise turns deadly as Kolchak finds himself trapped on a yacht at sea with a rapacious werewolf.
episodes.title: The Werewolf

episodes.synopsis: Looking into a series of deaths surrounding a conductor, Kolchak learns that someone may have taken over the maestro's identity from beyond the grave.
episodes.title: Firefall

episodes.synopsis: A senator forms a pact with Satan, and Kolchak discovers that the politician can assume the form of a frightening black mastiff.
episodes.title: The Devil's Platform

episodes.synopsis: Kolchak is puzzled by a series of suicides among the high-society set, and he soon discovers a shadowy American Indian who vanishes at will.
episodes.title: Bad Medicine

episodes.synopsis: When Spanish moss is found at the scene of several murders, the investigation points to a Cajun man who's been asleep for weeks.
episodes.title: The Spanish Moss Murders

episodes.synopsis: When strange phenomena and bizarre deaths plague the new Lakefront Hospital, Kolchak's investigation leads him to the building foreman.
episodes.title: The Energy Eater

episodes.synopsis: It seems that the recent gruesome deaths at Roosevelt Heights have been caused by rats, but Kolchak discovers something far more sinister.
episodes.title: Horror in the Heights

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the mysterious death of a scientist, Kolchak uncovers secret research regarding the development of artificial intelligence.
episodes.title: Mr. R.I.N.G.

episodes.synopsis: Savage primates assault the employees of an oil company's laboratory, leaving Kolchak to unravel the mystery of where they came from.
episodes.title: Primal Scream

episodes.synopsis: Kolchak takes on a vengeful fashion designer who's using witchcraft to eliminate her professional enemies.
episodes.title: The Trevi Collection

episodes.synopsis: A series of grisly decapitations have one thing in common: Witnesses report seeing a headless motorcyclist commit the crimes.
episodes.title: Chopper

episodes.synopsis: The deaths of several college students lead Kolchak to their study of an ancient stone tablet -- but his investigation may put him at risk.
episodes.title: Demon in Lace

episodes.synopsis: A series of gruesome murders leads Kolchak to a bizarre Aztec cult that has plans to resurrect an ancient god via a "perfect sacrifice."
episodes.title: Legacy of Terror

episodes.synopsis: When the museum housing his armor is converted into a disco, a medieval knight stalks the city, committing murders with ancient weapons.
episodes.title: The Knightly Murders

episodes.synopsis: When a dating service's young clients turn up dead of old age, Kolchak's investigation reveals that the service's operator is in fact Helen of Troy.
episodes.title: The Youth Killer

episodes.synopsis: Kolchak traces the clues in a series of savage deaths at a secret government archive to a prehistoric lizard protecting her eggs.
episodes.title: The Sentry
